shared.model.map.hex

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.hex.Hex
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChitHex

    public class Hex
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a Hex in the map. The map is comprised of hexes. A hex has a HexLocation and a HexType
    Author:
    Joel Bradley
